description: Atom-Browser is the plugin to browse the web, preview files, auto-reload, and search Google within Atom
name: atom-browser
readme: Atom-Browser is the plugin to browse the web, preview files, auto-reload, and search Google within Atom

reloadByDefault.title: Reload by default
reloadByDefault.description: Toggles auto reload to be on by default

reloadDelay.title: Reload on save delay
reloadDelay.description: Time in ms to wait before reloading (1000ms = 1second)

showZoomFactor.title: Zoom Factor
showZoomFactor.description: Changes the zoom factor to the specified factor. Zoom factor is zoom percent divided by 100, so 300% = 3.0.

showBackground.title: Show Background
showBackground.description: The default background is dark grey. Enable this for white

autoPrefix.title: Prefix HTTPS
autoPrefix.description: Prefix urls with HTTP or HTTPS

defaultLocation.title: Default Location
defaultLocation.description: Choose the default dock location for the Atom Browser: right or bottom

initialUrl.title: Initial Url
initialUrl.description: An initial URL to start in

emitterEnabled.title: Save ScrollY on reload
emitterEnabled.description: Save ScrollY on reload. Enables emitting data from webview to atom

url_overwrite.title: URL Overwrites
url_overwrite.description: Paths to overwrite when right click previewing a file. Allows you to map a filepath to your localhost!

static_server.title: Static Serve
static_server.description: Preview files from a local webserver
